fourObstacles.heading: 4 Key Obstacles Holding Back Your Import-Export Operations
items: Complex and error-prone import-export document handling
There’s no tool or system that helps minimize time-consuming manual tasks.
Difficulties in complying with customs regulations & international laws
Manage multiple suppliers and logistics partners

items.title: Order creation & document preparation
subTitle: Sellers create export orders.
Prepare necessary documents: commercial invoice, packing list, Certificate of Origin (C/O), Air Waybill (AWB) / Bill of Lading (B/L), and customs declaration.

items.title: Export customs declaration
subTitle: Submit the customs declaration electronically or directly to customs authorities.
Goods may undergo inspection and risk assessment (and verification if required).

items.title: International shipping
subTitle: After customs clearance, goods are transported to the port/airport.
The carrier receives the shipment and issues the Bill of Lading (B/L).
Goods are shipped by sea/air to the importing country.

items.title: Import customs declaration
subTitle: The importing company declares customs clearance with local authorities.
Import duties and taxes are calculated and paid if applicable.
Necessary procedures are completed before goods are released.

items.title: Fulfillment & last-mile delivery
subTitle: Goods are transported to the destination warehouse and handed over to the recipient.
Handle any issues and settle logistics-related payments.

items.title: Automated Air Waybill (AWB) generation
items.subTitle: Automatically fill in all necessary details and generates AWBs without manual entry, saving time and reducing data entry errors.

items.title: Custom document template library
items.subTitle: Store, manage, and reuse document templates based on cargo type, shipping routes, and customs requirements, reducing processing time and minimizing errors.

items.title: Real-time shipment tracking
items.subTitle: Continuously update shipment status, providing timely and accurate information for both you and your customers.

items.title: Master Air Waybill (MAWB) / House Air Waybill (HAWB) management
items.subTitle: Link multiple HAWBs to a single MAWB for easier tracking. Supports shipment splitting when deliveries need to be sent to multiple destinations.

items.title: Electronic signature
items.subTitle: Enable digital signatures to speed up approval processes and optimize document handling workflows.

items.title: Create and manage import-export documents
items.subTitle: Quickly generate and manage essential documents such as invoices, packing lists, and manifests, reducing paperwork processing time by up to 90% and minimizing data entry errors.

items.title: Customs portal integration
items.subTitle: Seamlessly connect with electronic customs systems across multiple countries, enabling automated declarations and expediting the clearance process with real-time data synchronization.

items.title: Customs regulations updates
items.subTitle: Continuously update database of customs regulations for different countries, providing real-time alerts for restricted goods or items requiring special permits.

items.title: Automated HS code classification
items.subTitle: Suggest the most accurate HS codes based on product descriptions and historical data, reducing errors, speeding up customs declarations, and ensuring compliance with import-export regulations.

items.title: Import tax and fee estimation tool
items.subTitle: Automatically calculate customs duties, taxes, and related fees according to each country’s regulations, helping businesses accurately forecast costs, optimize budgets, and avoid unexpected expenses.

items.title: Integrated electronic customs declaration
items.subTitle: Easily submit customs declarations directly through the software, ensuring regulatory compliance and significantly reducing clearance times.

items.title: Flexible rate configuration
items.subTitle: Customize pricing tables based on origin/destination, weight, cargo type, and service level, optimizing shipping costs and ensuring precise automated rate calculations for each shipment.

items.title: Surcharge management
items.subTitle: Update and apply surcharges (fuel, peak season, security, etc.) in real time to ensure accurate quotations and optimize operational costs.

items.title: Flexible pricing approval process
items.subTitle: Enable approval workflows for special quotations or discount thresholds, ensuring strict control while maintaining flexibility in pricing strategies.
